localize.title: Buzzing on Reddit
localize.description: See what's buzzing on Reddit in your native language

blogPost.excerpt: 365 & me is a simple journaling app that helps you to get to know yourself better. Answer a question a day to reflect about your life, see how you change over the years and celebrate your achievements!
blogPost.body: 365 & me is a simple journaling app that helps you to get to know yourself better. Answer a question a day to reflect about your life, see how you change over the years and celebrate your achievements!
blogPost.title: 365 & me - Journaling app with daily questions to reflect
blogPost.author: Alina Hang

localize.description: 365&我是一款简单的日记应用，帮助你更好的了解自己。每天回答一个问题来反思你的生活，看看你这些年的变化，并庆祝你的成就!
localize.tagline: 日记应用，每天都有问题需要反思

localize.description: 365&我是一款簡單的日記應用，幫助你更好的瞭解自己。每天回答一個問題來反思你的生活，看看你這些年的變化，並慶祝你的成就!
localize.tagline: 日記應用，每天都有問題需要反思

previous.excerpt: Codeprints offers geeky wall art for nerds and developers. You can create a personalized print of your GitHub contributions to motivate you every day. A service created for developers by developers.
previous.title: Codeprints - Your code is art - git contributions on your wall

localize.description: Codeprints为书呆子和开发者提供极客墙艺。你可以为你的GitHub贡献创建一个个性化的打印，以激励你每天。一个由开发者为开发者创建的服务。
localize.tagline: 你的代码就是艺术--git贡献在你的墙上。

localize.description: Codeprints爲書呆子和開發者提供極客牆藝。你可以爲你的GitHub貢獻創建一個個性化的打印，以激勵你每天。一個由開發者爲開發者創建的服務。
localize.tagline: 你的代碼就是藝術--git貢獻在你的牆上。

next.excerpt: Clipboard checker is an open source set it and forget it chrome extension that scans any text you copy in your browser to determine if malicious content has been added or changed.
next.title: Clipboard Checker - Keep your clipboard safe from JS injections.

localize.description: 剪贴板检查器是一个开源的设置并忘记它的chrome扩展，它可以扫描你在浏览器中复制的任何文本，以确定是否有恶意内容被添加或更改。
localize.tagline: 保护你的剪贴板不被JS注入。

localize.description: 剪貼板檢查器是一個開源的設置並忘記它的chrome擴展，它可以掃描你在瀏覽器中複製的任何文本，以確定是否有惡意內容被添加或更改。
localize.tagline: 保護你的剪貼板不被JS注入。
